name: A Day In The Life: Her Story
name_original: A Day In The Life: Her Story
description:
A short, one-shot visual novel made with Visual Novel Maker (VNM).

  • Entire gameplay is approx. 30min long, give or take
  • Play through all the choices to piece the story together
  • Multiple Endings (2 Neutral, 1 Good, 1 Best)
  • Game assets consist of DLCs, Stock Assets, and Original Art by their respective owners (with permission to use)

This is the first game I made with VNM. And for someone who prefers writing in the 3rd person POV, telling a story almost completely through dialogue was challenging.

This particular project was a platform for me to experiment on what VNM can do for someone with limited to no programming knowledge like myself.

I hope you enjoy playing the game as much as I did making it!

This was a first for me, feedback is always appreciated! ü
